headline: Truck drivers win $52M whistleblower retaliation verdict against Sysco
summary: A California jury awarded $52 million to truck drivers who said Sysco retaliated against them for reporting safety and labor violations. The post Truck drivers win $52M whistleblower retaliation verdict against Sysco appeared first on FreightWaves.
